name: Squarehead: Warzone
description:
The Earth is under attack from powerful enemies like zombies, mummies, aliens, etc.

And you and your partner are the last soldiers of army.

Go defeat the evil forces and save the world now!

Features

  • 2 different main characters are playable.
  • Selectable difficulty between Easy / Hard mode.
  • Local co-op is available.
  • All guns have own cool SFX.
  • Ammo-free, time-based new random gun changing system.

Credits

  • Wallpapers and character concept arts by Arnid Xiong
  • Tilemap sprites by Kenney

Developer's Letter #2

Hello,

This is my first top-down game made with Unity3D.

And it's also the second small project of my game development journey.

This game is inspired by the game called 'Boxhead' that I used to play with my lover.

I thought it would be excited if I could create similar game with new characters.

So my girlfriend designed all the characters and I made this game!

There are not many features compare to 'Boxhead'.

However, I'm glad enough that I have completed some game kinda look like my favorite one.

I will keep up my game work to create fun game.

Any feedbacks would be really appreciated.

Thank you for playing.

Good luck!

You are my motivation and the source of endurance.
